io.deepstream

Interface DeepstreamRuntimeErrorHandler


  • public interface DeepstreamRuntimeErrorHandler
    The expectations would be for java clients to implement this and add it via the *setDeepstreamRuntimeErrorHandler* handler in order to catch all runtime errors that can occur without requiring to listening to it on seperate threads. IMPORTANT: Errors that are specific to a request, e.g. a RPC timing out or a record not being permissioned are either passed directly to the method that requested them or will be caught on a more granular listener.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onException(Topic topic, Event event, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Triggered whenever a runtime error occurs ( mostly async such as TimeOuts or MergeConflicts ).

    • Method Detail

      • onException

        void onException(Topic topic,
               Event event,
               java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Triggered whenever a runtime error occurs ( mostly async such as TimeOuts or MergeConflicts ). Recieves a topic to indicate if it was e.g. RPC, event and a english error message to simplify debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        topic - The Topic the error occured on
        event - The Error Event
        errorMessage - The error message
